11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Abi Qatadah said:"My father told us that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite Umm Al-Quran and two surahs in the first two rak'ahs of Zuhr and 'Asr, and he would make us hear a verse sometimes, and he used to make the first rak'ah lengthy

chapter.ara-name: باب إِسْمَاعِ الإِمَامِ الآيَةَ فِي الظُّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam saying a verse audibly in Zuhr
